content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling southbound on us-41 in appleton when i noticed a very unusual high density cloud that was gliding like a lifting body instead of floating. it passed almost directly between myself and the sun and was very dense. it was very low in altitude at approximately 1000ft. (photo 3057a) 
beside it was some type of other unusual cloud that was moving more like a fish than a cloud that was staying right beside it and seemed to look towards me as to make eye contact.(photo 3057b) 
at this point it begain to change direction and bank away from me. it was then i could see some type of v-pattern on the bottom rear of it almost as if there was some kind of a v-shape hull or craft inside of it.(photo 3062b)
i lost sight of the objects as i traveled farther south on us-41.
i know this all sounds very strange and i have thought about it for several months now and have many other photographs of the event that i have looked at very closely and i have decided just to put it out there for others to see. 
the photos appear dark because of the relationship of the sun to the camera which was actually a benefit. i have adjusted the brightness and contrast levels to better show the extreme density and detail of the clouds but have not altered the photos in any way.
content.summary: Ufo cloud with extreme density gliding and banking over the fox river

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down hwy 92 headed toward woodstock right past sandy plains road when i saw a bright white light shining about 100-150 yards off to my left above some trees about another 100-150 yards up.  it was almost as bright as if someone were shining a flashlight directly into your eyes.  i had to stop at a red light about 30 seconds after i first saw it and watched it for about 2 mins before i kept moving.  it did not move the entire time i sat at the light and then all of a sudden, as i drove just past it, i watched it plummet straight down almost like a shooting star but directly towards the ground.  i immediately stuck my head out the window and listened for a crash but never heard one.  i couldn't tell how far out it was from the road or how to begin looking for it so i kept driving home.  i have never been so terrified by something that i could not explain in my life.  i had no idea what i saw but i'm not crazy and i'm not a liar and i know i saw something.  i can't really explain my exact feelings about it right after other than fear and disbelief.
content.summary: Bright white light

content.detailedDescription: At twilight,dusk,just after sunset,i was putting away some games my brother,cousin,& i had been playing. i was 12 years old, my brother two years younger, my cousin three years younger than me. as i put the games on the shelf, i looked out the window & my brother & cousin were standing in the front yard watching this light across the highway hovering over the woods/trees. i ran out to observe it too. our house was on one of the most busy highways. it had all the main traffic in the rural area..The truck traffic, everything, this was before the interstate was built,so traffic was always constant. taking mental notes of alot of the surroundings during this sighting, i noticed no traffic was going by & no neighbors were outside in their yards from our viewpoint. we three watched the huge light for quite a bit. i knew my parents were in the garage at that moment. my dad was working with some power tools at the time. he & my mom were having a dicussion. i ran to the garage & i begged them to come to see the ufo. at that moment, my dad was also mad because his power tools were not working properly..Power was going on and off. i screamed "it's because of the ufo"! not convincing them to look, i ran back to the front yard with my brother & cousin. we contunied to watch it. the object just hovered over the treetops, very low. as for distance, i cannot correctly say what the distance was. but the woods it hovered over is an area we had played in many times so it was close, & very visible from our front yard. the object was as bright as anything i had ever seen, orange/red light that was disc shaped. the size was huge, like a football field. it glowed very bright againest the dusk colored summer sky. it seemly had a pulsating effect to it, but no sound. we contunied to watch and suddenly the object just blinked out..So to say. in a snap, it all seemed to go to the center, to like a dot, then it was gone. we didn't see the object again. the length of time of the sighting had to be at least 10 minutes..Plus. this is all very vivid to me and embeded in my memory. i do not believe there was any time lost during this event. i remember during the event having a feeling like it may have been just for us to see.
content.summary: Red/orange bright light..Disc shaped,huge, hovering over woods

content.detailedDescription: It was summer 1985,,, me, my brother michael, and my best friend mike toney were throwing a baseball, playing catch in the middle of our street. it got dark real late. we lived on a military base..Ft. huachuca which is outside of sierra vista, az.  i don't remember who saw it first but we looked up and there was this large black triangle gliding silently but you could hear a low hum....It went over us and circled around then went behind the mountains next to our base and came over again and went straight....On the object there were 3 white lights on the points of the triangle object and a red light in the middle and it would go off/on slowly.  it was probably about 5000 feet above us maybe... but it glided slowly... and i didn't hear an engine roaring...We lived on a military base...All i can say it was definitely a ufo..I kept this with me for 25 years but thanks to tnmufon she told me to report it so i did.  .The photo attached is a good drawing of what i witnessed on that evening
content.summary: Black triangle hovering, gliding in silence

content.detailedDescription: Bright green light flew above tree tops. i was driving to work going south down alabama road. the object was so bright and i was approximately one mile away from the object. i lost sight of it behind some trees, but thought i could see it when i got to state road. i was very excited to see the object, however, when i got to the road i was to afraid to head east in the direction of the object. the reason i am telling about it now is what i saw is in the mufon opening pictoral at about the 1:37 mark.
content.summary: Bright green light

content.detailedDescription:
I have reported ufo sitings with regularity. seeing ufos are not something i think about or ever tell anyone about. they are. on tuesday morning 6 35a.M. i stepp'd out for my morning "pray'r" walk. i have been doing this faithfully every morning since 2007. i walk and converse with the god of the universe. my dog, tiphani escorts me. i live right next to a complex of baseball fields. i always walk between  the fields. on tuesday, i look'd up toward the western sky and one of the large planets was position'd at 4 o clock in the sky. a traveling circle appear'd in the sky just shy of the same position and to the north. it travel'd right beneath the large planet and then disappear'd. at first it appear'd to fade in and out as if traveling through a haze but the early morning sky was perfectly clear.
i stood still and watched it for about 35 seconds and when it cross'd beneath the planet, it disappear'd. i stood there and watched for a bit longer and nothing reappeared.

the thing that makes this sighting interesting is that "first of all, i immediately thought i am going to observe this fully so that i can report it."
which i did.

noting the height in the sky and the direction it traveled in-north west-to west.

of course, when  objects disappear you can never swear you saw anything, there is no left proof.

i continued my walk and pray'r time to the deep-dark woods where i kneel and pray to a sovereign supra-natural god.

on this morning, i experienced an odd vision-trance-awareness.
where i kneel is a large hill that juts up from a low meadow of trees and a small creek flows at the base of the cliff.

i kneel always with my back to the cliff and the small, babbling stream.
this morning, i didn't so much pray aloud as i was in motion to god. i raised my arms, i stretched them to the heavens and then dropp'd them to my side.

in my mind, i was aware of a mighty presence of an angel shadowing my every move, when i raised my arms,he raised his mighty wings into the air behind me, when i waved my arms, he glided his wings in tandem with my movements. 

the fantastical awareness is that this angelic being was so huge. it fill'd up a huge amount of space and simultaneously was not there at all.

magnificent was the presence.
i knew it was sheltering me, providing me with security.


these things are never explainable or rational, they are.

later on tuesday evening, i was giving a young friend a ride home from a dinner, and we were traveling 70 mph. on i-35. i noted in my rear view mirror the presence of a car weaving eratically behind me.
my young friend was talking and oblivious. suddenly i re-focused on the road to my front and saw that all the cars on the interstate had come a dead-halt and i was within feet of crashing into the car before me.

miraculously, i swerved and the lane next to mine was stopp'd a bit more ahead and my reflexes braked and uncannily, i was able to stop my car in a miraculous short amount of distance.

i was not scared.
i was not in control.

in hindsight, i think all of this is related.
content.summary: Angels watching over me

content.detailedDescription:
I was most likely taking photos of the sunset or i may have thought the bringt light was a jet. i was looking at my photos on my computer and noticed a bright light and a dull object. i zoomed and i saw a bright light and a silver solid object. it's weird and i have the photos. i guess it could be the space station but i have seen it pass over my house and i don't think it looks like that. i am very interested to see what ya'll think of this photo. please let me know what it is even if it's nothing. not a weather balloon either because i looked that up and looks nothing like it. maybe a satalite, but i doubt that too. 
laura miller
(337(580-5486
content.summary: I didn't even know i was photographicing it until a year later when i examined the photo

content.detailedDescription:
This report is submitted by field investigator who recieved it from the witness first hand.This is a rufos (roundtown ufo society)circleville,oh
generated report.This case although an historical one i feel is of value to be documented for research.
in april (day unknown) 1968 the witness and her friend were driving home and as they approached the witnesses house they both observed an orange light across the street.She pulled into the drive and they got out of the car to see that it was approximately 100' away in the ssw, 6'-8' across, 1'off of the ground,orange in color and "round like the moon".No sound was heard.They watched for 20 minutes then the objects left side and its right side "folded into itself" and disappeared.Then the women went inside the house.
the next day the witnesses neighbor came to her home and wanted to see where he had also viewed the object from his house down the road. he walked across the street where she told him where they seen the object,but he found no evidence visible.
(the witness husband had recently passed away and her friend was staying with her at this time)
the next day at about 5:00pm  the friend was in the kitchen and looked out of the window and saw a bright white sphere 5'-8' across with " many spokes coming from out of it" the object was 10'-12' off the ground,15' outside the window between the house and a large oak tree to the north.
the friend let out a loud scream and the witness came runnig from the other room. she was pointing out the window and the witness observed it also for 5-10 seconds before it "blinked out" and disappeared.This event frightened her so badly that she packed her belongings immediately and refused to stay at the witnesses home any longer.
side note: in the morning the witnesses dog went missing and was never found.
no other sightings have occured since these 2 events by the witness.
content.summary: Orange orb 6'-8' across, 1' off the ground

content.detailedDescription: I was at my cousins house on my way home. we were just approaching a dirt road when i saw something flashing in the sky. so i decided to stop and look up, and there was a slow moving, shiny, mettalic, object just cruising in the sky. at first i thought to myself " naw thats just an airplane". but i kept seeing the flashes on my way home. so i looked up again, and it was just floating above a cow field, spining in a clockwise motion. then i pointed it out to my cousin and he was speechless. i was astounded. i watch u.F.O hunters when i can, but i never thought it could really happen. so i decided to take a picture, but my cellphones camera just showed a really bright red light when i aimed at the object. as i was looking at the phone, the object just slowly ascended and just shot of in a flash of light. and as it shot off, i heard a high-pitched ring in my ear. and that was the last i saw it. when i got home, i went to sleep thinking i must be crazy. then i woke up remembering the dream i had. i clearly saw the object was no airplane in the dream. it felt like the dream was real.
content.summary: It was moving slowly across the sky as if it were observing me. then it stopped completly. then it just shot off in a flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: Was with my boys in the driveway talking for a while... and my son finally told us to look up at the sky... asking what the object was. we all looked up and saw this object which looked like two spheres connected and spinning slowly. the object would shine a light directly at us during the same moment of every rotation. it was very close at the beginning of the sighitng, and just traveled very slowly away from us... we watched it till it got to far to see. was very vivid, and was during the day. we were all realy amazed to see a ufo during the day. i have never heard of such a ufo... of this shape... was white/metallic in color. just made circular motions.. over and over again.... and the light would shine at us during every rotation. will look for tomorrow at the same time....
content.summary: Was the shape of two spheres connected to make one object.. like a number eight

content.detailedDescription: This was during marching band camp in the football field. when the director told us to sit down, we did, and while i was listening i looked to my left. i saw a spherical object slowly going low across the sky. it made 1 stop, then kept going in the same direction. i felt happy. this is not the first time i have seen it. it usually appears when i am in a good mood. i lost sight of it when it went below the horizon.
content.summary: A spherical object moving slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling on rt 347 south bound when i noticed  a orange flickering object
flying from sse on a nnw direction.At first i thought it was a star but after stopping the vehicle i noticed it was moving a rate faster than a prop plane
but slower than a jet i could not tell how hi it was or how big.
 i do not believe it was aircraft due to the color.Avoca airport is not far away
and i am used to seeing different types of aircraft.It was much different than 
any aircraft in the area.I only observed it for a short duration due to the fact that
the road is on a mountain pass and no place to pull off the road.
content.summary: An orange object flying on a sse to a nnw flight path while traveling rt 347

content.detailedDescription: Ok i admit it,i was sky fishing again and got another pesky unknown or something in bottom right corner of picture.I see no wings or legs or flaping and i can easily identify birds or insects or balloons and i don't report them of course.The fact is it is flying around the sky and if it is an insect can someone from mufon identify it for the record.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
** ultra-bright object high altitude, intense fluorescent-like light with slight green tint. too intense to be reflected sunlight or aircraft approach lights **

taveling to a school campus for an evening class sw down state 796 from jennersville, pa toward the village of kelton, pa. noticed object at high altitude to the se. appeared to be stationary, however i was traveling at 50 mph so the object could have been as well. had the appearance of a luminous tear drop shape with a metallic, non-luminous extension from the point of the tear drop. had the appearance of a very, very bright fluorescent light with a pale green tint and blurred edges. at first i considered it might be an aircraft or a balloon reflecting the waning sunlight, but it was too intense. would have to have been a parabolic mirror or something similar to focus that much light. too intense to be aircraft approach lights, which would appear to be less stark with all the ambient light in the sky. turned se onto pennocks bridge rd driving strait toward the object, which i could see just below the roofline of my car. by the time i had traveled 1/2 mile down the road toward a bend in the road, the object abruptly vanished. i looked around to see whether i had lost track of it, or it had moved. there was plenty of light in the sky (not yet dusk) and it was nowhere to be seen. no contrail, no object with perhaps the light facing another direction. there is no possibility that i missed it, the light was simply too intense. perhaps someone was perpetrating a prank and hung a mercury vapor lamp on a balloon, however the sky was clear (only a few stratus clouds) and there were no other objects in the area. the only thing i noticed was a pair of short, vertical black smoke contrails to the w that i had not previously seen. however, these were in a different part of the sky from where the object was last seen.
content.summary: Ultra-bright object high altitude, intense fluorescent-like light with slight green tint. too intense to be reflected sunlight or aircraft approach lights

content.detailedDescription:
My co-worker and i were at work having lunch in my office in downtown denver (15th floor). i looked up and i could see the sky through the window. i asked her "what's that"?. she replied it's a military helicopter. i laughed and said "no way. that's not a helicopter and it's not a plane either". she laughed and said "what is it then...A ufo". i told her to walk over to the window and get a better look. she did but lost sight of it for a moment. however, i could still see the object moving from where i was sitting and told her where to look. as i motioned to get up to get a better look, i noticed it was moving slow, stopping and moving again before it disappeared right front of us. it didn't go through a cloud or anything, it just simply vanished from our sights. almost as if it knew we were looking at it. the location of the ufo was about 2 or 3 miles southeast of the state capitol and about 20,000 ft in the air. i am not that great at guessing distance in the air but i would say that 20,000 ft is an ok guess. 

my friend and i are government employees and we are both honest people. she has never seen a ufo before and i have had over 50 sightings since 1997. the funny thing is, i am starting to see more and more solid objects in the sky and not just unusual lights in the night sky.
content.summary: Brown ball

content.detailedDescription: I took some landscape photos at the summit of chinook pass on a clear sunny day. never noticed anything unusual. when looking at the photos i noticed a speck in the upper right corner of one of the pictures. i thought it was an eagle or a hawk so i zoomed in on it a what i saw was a metallic looking disc shaped object and not a bird. you can see the sun glisten from the object and what appears to be a slight vapor trail emitting from what looks like a hot spot under the object. the photos were shot in raw format so no enhancements were made. what you see is what you get. i did have an encounter with a ufo in 1977 in puyallup, washington but no photos from that one.
content.summary: From a picture taken near mt. rainier

content.detailedDescription: Well, these lights are pretty frequent here, not on a daily or weekly basis but every few months we go through spurts here that we see strange rows of orangle lights or orangle ball up in the sky. i was driving home from work and saw a row of orange lights come on then quickly go out. then a few seconds later they came on again in the same pattern and quickly faded out again. didn't see them again after that. i arrived at my house about 2 minutes after i saw them and looked in the direction of where i saw the lights and saw nothing. about 5 minuets later a military jet zoomed over my area coming in the opposite direction of those lights. we have b-1's and c-130's here where i live the lights were not those and the military jet was also not the normal b-1 or c-130 we see here. i see those planes frequently and it was a smaller plane than the b-1.
content.summary: Orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I looked up into the sky to observe orion, and happened to see a blinking light in the sky.  it looked just like a very distant star(i guess that's obvious), anyway, at first i thought it was just a satelite but then i realized it was barely moiving.  i watched it blink presicely every 7 seconds for 10 minutes before i decided to go inside.  i have seen many satelites but they move much faster.  this object appeared inside orion, above the belt moving to the west. in ten minutes of veiwing it moved from just north of bellatrix to  just sse of betelguese, blinking every 7 seconds.
content.summary: Starlike object blinking every 7 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: The object was lite up much like a plane, but with more lights.  the lights were in a row and there was probably 6-8 of them and they were white.  it was flying within 50-60 feet above the ground and no noise was herd.  it was headed on a south-east trajectory, when, it made a u-turn and headed north-east until i lost sight of it in the tree line.  i have never seen an aircraft make such a sharp turn at such a low speed.  it was probably traveling 40-60 mph.  i couldnt make out the shape of this vehicle, but the lights were in a row both in the front and back.
content.summary: Silent, low-flying plane like object with lights

content.detailedDescription: From above, lights coming twords the ground very slowly, no blinking,  same area in the sky, light moving around in no pattern fast. no blinking, alot going on tonight,  cascade mountains area
content.summary: Eastern falling lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i 68 at mile 33 headed towards cumberland,md.I was taking to my daughter at the time when a extremly bright light came into my sight from over me.Looked like a meteor but was a greenish blue color.It was east bound and didnt make any type of moves other than striaght ahead.This was the first time i have seen anything like this.I left my phone # if you would like to call me.The reason that i had not wrote before was that i heard a man on the coast to coast show last night which sounded alot like mine,except he said that it had hit there.{please talk to them about that}please let me know if you find out anything.Thanks,doug
content.summary: A blueish-green meteior type object went east bound at a very high rate of speed.It disapeared behind the mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to let my doggie out in my fenced yard.
after viewing the most profound moon halo and i have seen many but not like this one...

the moving object caught my left eye and i watched it until it was not in sight. within a minute or so it was gone. ( i said wait a minute i need to stop and look at this. i was in my yard looking to the east south east.

i must say it has left me in thought of what it was.
content.summary: Moving, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were driving back from eastern michigan university that night listening to wjr a clear channel radio station in the detroit michigan.  we heard mark avery calling in to wjr with a call to the warren pierce show on his way to i think florida tell him about a ufo near the new i275 freeway.  

my friend and listened all the way down home that night and heard reports the whole way from other viewers it just so happened we spotted in the way home on us23 north approaching the north territorial road exit.  we got off at that exit and stopped at viewed it.

the object hung with no sound, no hanging motor pods, no rudder or elevator, and no hanging gondola.  so i ruled not a blimp.  it also had concave marks on the side.  i hung above the trees low enough that i could have thrown a snow and hit it.
content.summary: Driving n. on us23 and n. territorial exit.

content.detailedDescription: A co-worker and i was standing on a bridge next to the potomac river across from washington d.C.I look toward the potomac river and saw a very bright blue light about 2:00 in the sky (maybe a little highter)it seem to pause and then traveled away across the washington d.C. skyline not going up or down just away very very fast unlike anything i have ever seem before. it never flash any lights, it was just a very bright blue light sort of like a light on a police car only not flashing and much brighter. i would really like to know what this was.
content.summary: Bright blue light that was still and then moved very fast away.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were having a little fire and talking in our back yard. we both saw out of the corner of ours eyes an object shooting over our neighbors house. it was brite, red first then blue, bigger than a shooting star. we were both speechless.....I was expecting it to like explode with like fireworks or something. it was quick and seemed as though i could have touched it. it almost made same motions as a shooting star, but bigger. it appeared out of no where and we saw it longer than any shooting star i have ever seen. it like moved like a shooting star but kind of dipped down and up the slightest bit. after we were like, what in the world. i felt confused and speechless.
content.summary: Not sure what...Looked up saw a bright larger than shooting star object red, blue looked brite i thought it was going to explode

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking outside a friends apartment on her patio and taking some beautiful pictures of the clouds.  an airplane came flying overhead towards us pretty low, i could see the details of the wings and underside very clearly but before i could adjust my camera setting to take a pic of it, it disappeared over the roof.  a few seconds later it came back the way it came and flew eastward.  there was no chemtrail or comtrail and it made a motor like realistic sound.  
what was odd is that when it was passing overhead going east i took a couple of good pics but when i looked at my camera the plane wasn't in the shot.  i showed my girlfriend, puzzled, and took another shot to show her it wasn't showing up in the frame even i widened the shot considerably.  i took a couple more pics as it was farther away and those ones seemed ok, you could see a tiny spot of the plane shape.
when i took the camera home to upload my photos i noticed a blur in the spot where the plane was supposed to be, when i looked closer i could see a dark round blur.  in a series of three pics i was able to catch an orb moving east, it is cloaked but you can change the pic to a negative image and clearly see the round orb moving over the sky in separate frames.  in subsequent frames the camera looks like an airplane, but like i said, there was no tail of exhaust or anything coming from it, and come to think of it it was really fast.  there are alot of chemtrail and sylph action going on here in this area, i wonder if they are connected?  i'll have to add some pics tomorrow, i just had to show my girlfriend the pictures to show her for herself- she's blown away too- and left them at her house.
i wonder what they were doing, did they see me?  were they giving me a chance for my picture by decloaking temporarily?  an advanced culture isn't going to let that happen unless they had some reason... one other thing maybe not worth mentioning but happend that day, a couple of hours before this, at work i got this sentence in my head and wrote it down because i thought it was beautiful in its own way.  "the path to god lies within your own heart" i put it on a tiny piece of paper and put it in my pocket and carried it all day.
content.summary: Ghost plane shows up on camera as an orb

content.detailedDescription:
I waited until this morning (1/21/2010) to post the sighting because i wanted to verify i wasn't seeing lights from a helicopter or an antenna tower.
on the morning of the 20th january 2010 between mile marker 20 and 19 (heading westbound) i noticed 3 lights in a triangle formation slightly off to the left of the eastbound lanes of route 50. they were approximately 100 feet above the treeline and stationary. i could see no visible marker or beacon lights. the lights were bright enough to see clearly through the cloud cover. 
i'm not sure how long it was there but i witnessed it for approximately 3 minutes approaching and from the driver's side mirror as i continued west toward davidsonville, md.

weather 1/20/2010: cloudy w/slight rain/winter mix 
weather 1/21/2010: clear and 33 degrees

i really think i need to start carrying a camera in my vehicle.
content.summary: Lights in a triangle formation above rt. 50 near annapolis maryland

content.detailedDescription:
We'll i had just got to my father's house in coachella, ca on oct 30, 2009. my fiance and i decided to go to bevmo in indio and decided to take the back road, going down ave 52 towards indio right next to the empire polo grounds. i was driving and my fiance chris told me "there's a huge ufo driving right by us, it's huge and flashing all kinds of lights." 

now he doesn't believe in aliens and ufo's like i do so i assumed he was teasing me. so i didn't bother to try and look to his side cause it was dark, i was driving and there was a phish concert going on at the polo grounds so i was focused due to the cops about. chris kept on about the ufo he saw and i was like "yeah right". we went to bevmo and on the way home i took ave 51 instead of 52 and i saw it. it was the hugest ufo, very close to the car. it reminded me of a mothership or something due to it's size and all the lights. that turned on and off almost in a sequence as if communicating. i lowered my wondow and drove about 35 cause i was in awe. there were a couple cars pulled over and i wanted to pull over but the fact it was so close freaked me out. then all of a sudden in a split second it was super up high and then we reached a blockade and there were cops and other people that turned us down polo rd. i kept looking in my rear view mirror trying to see it. then when i turned down ave 52 to get back home i saw it but it was much further away, past the polo fields and then it just vanished.

now we know what we saw, and it was something we will never forget. it left me out of sorts and it made chris a believer. it was about 9 at night and even though it was dark there were lights around and i could see it's saturn like shape. the light were huge and some would turn on in a sequence and then they would go black and others would start up. and not just one color there were many flashing. i felt a strange vibration or humming. but then again i was driving and it could've just been me. till today i still feel like i saw it for a reason and i now have no doubt that they are out there. i kinda felt like i was meant to see it. like somehow i picked up on where to go for it to show itself to us.

i know it's strange right????
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge ufo by indio polo grounds

content.detailedDescription:
First in 1994 i filed out your papers and became a field investigator, with the hope someone would contact me form your office. i received your mailings and reported several of my sightings to an attorney beckman in manchester ct, as well as the mufo director in miami, (who was very nice) i contacted your director in tn in 2008. i also attended a ufo member discussion in ft myers fl in 1994 where symbols and my encounters were sent up for review and found to be of some merit, "i was told anyway. in short my family has been haunted by ufo���s our entire life from the time i and my younger brother were abducted in 1966. i have for the past 20 years tried very heard to talk with mufo and or of someone that can help me. if there is any doubt, i will cover any and all expenses to uncover and or solidify what i have to seen. i can recall the inside of the craft, i watched a fire ball the size of a vw come out of the sky as almost nothing then burst into a ball of fire, and only 50 yards above the ground and then turn on a 90, pick up speed to a good 70 ��� 100 miles an hour, rise up to clear a 2 story home and then dive into a wooded lot to simply vanish. i have seen cigar shaped ufos, hover over our car with my grand-mother and friends, a boomerang shaped ufo that first showed it���s self like the moon before intensifying and shooting directly to the ground in a seconds time and not 100 yards from me in glastonbury ct. my brother and i were taken from a farm house in sheffield mass in 1966 - 1968, more than once. i remember a tall guy/? in the huge helmet, on board, two operating boards that looked like it had brail on the top of it, there was screen were they showed me images, of a lake, water and willow trees, they were trying to tell me somthing. i can also tell you about the day we lost a good 4 - 6 hours while with my brother, mother & grandmother to find my granmother confused and walking around in a daze in a near by store down the street, and my mother out cold in the front of the car. hair will rises on my arms when i here the sound of peepers like you here outside in the trees, it's a sound from that night. my son wakes up with nose bleeds, as he has for years, steet lights pop weekly, i still have the feeling i have seen something of importance as a child, and i'm drawn to look up, at the right times, too see a ship. there have been numerous times i have known them to be near me, i can not put dates to it, nor can i separate this added mush,(if that's a word) and if that makes any sense. i can however remember pretty clear the first few times i was with them, i remember standing outside the craft, the two consoles, the hall behind me, the wall that showed the images, the guy in the space suite to my left, the one (gray if you will) that was also standing next to me and the other gray next to my brother about 12 feet behind me in a hallway to my right. i drew the symbols and had giving them to this group i attended in ft myers i still remember some of it. similar in the way of a few crop circles but simple and only a few lines and dots apposed to circles. i would like to add, my father was a mayer in ct, my mother ran a raido station, i was with entergy power & honeywel, with that said my father did not like to talk about this do to his position with the city,he has passed on.
                               vipontv@gmail.Com
locations:

1/	sheffield ma: abducted w/brother, showed images, walked the ship (1967)
2/	ma: family abduction from station wagon mother, brother, grandmother. (1969)
3/	sandisfield ma:  cigar shaped ship grandmother, myself and friend (1971)
4/	gt barrington mass: fire ball came from the sky, shot at me, w/ friend (1974)
5/	la: ufo over our car, la w/friend the shadow covers kmart parking lot (1976) 
6/	glastonbury ct: boomerang shot to the ground with wife (1993) 
7/	son have noise bleeds, street lights pop, feeling i���m watched (2002 ��� 2005)
8/	brother has ufo encounter in brownsburg in (2009)

content.summary: Round the size of a vw bug, came from the ski, turned and stayed about 5 feet above the ground,

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard late at night with my brother eatin tacos, when we see this eery red light glooming in the stary night. we were mystifed. then it started coming towards us when the wind started picking up very quickly. it landed on the ground, and a creature came out. then it grabbed my brother, and started walking back. then it turned around, and said in exact words " i. am. god. i will come back for you." it very sadly took my brother up into the sky, and dropped him from 40,00 thousand feet up. he died. i am sad.
content.summary: Shinny
